nodes.text: Joma Dehn was an individual who became a veteran hunter of members of the nexu species. Dehn hunted the animals on their homeworld of Cholganna at some time during or prior to the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

Joma Dehn was first mentioned in Beyond the Rim, a 2013 adventure module written by Sterling Hershey for the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire. The characters name and occupation, with no further context, is given as the source of a quote describing Cholganna.
